sentence.Network_en: At least seven people had been particularly and lastingly helpful to me.
sentence.Network_cn: 至少有七个人对我有过不同寻常、影响深远的帮助.

sentence.Network_en: Due to great attachment to the ecologic environment, eco - tourism must develop lastingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要生态旅游对生态环境具有非常大的依赖性, 必须走可持续发展道路.

sentence.Network_en: I know we can love deeply, tenderly and lastingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我知道我们能够爱得深切.爱得温柔. 并且爱得持久.
